data.title: Reading Text # 1 Groucho Marx Arthur Sheekman
data.meta_description: READING TEXT - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Groucho Marx had a long career across many entertainment mediums, but he also had a successful career as an author producing several books, plays, and over 100 articles and essays. However, his literary career was often overlooked and there were incorrect assumptions that he used ghost writers. Groucho had a collaborative relationship with his friend Arthur Sheekman where they provided editorial assistance to each other. For a brief period in the early 1940s, Groucho allowed Sheekman to publish some works under Groucho's name when Sheekman was having trouble getting published. The document analyzes correspondence between Groucho and Sheekman to categorize the essays from this period, concluding that their relationship was a collaboration,
